      • issueCertificate

        public static X509Certificate issueCertificate(String issuerDN,
                                               String subjectDN,
                                               KeyPair pair,
                                               int days,
                                               String algorithm)
                                        throws GeneralSecurityException,
                                               IOException

        Create a self-signed X.509 Certificate

        Example: X509Certificate x509 = issueCertificate("CN=Test", key, 31, "SHA1withRSA");

        Parameters:
        dn - the X.509 Distinguished Name, eg "CN=Test, L=London, C=GB"
        pair - the KeyPair
        days - how many days from now the Certificate is valid for
        algorithm - the signing algorithm, eg "SHA1withRSA"
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException
        IOException
